text:
LogicGate | Chicago, IL | ONSITE | https://www.logicgate.com | Platform Software Engineer

LogicGate is looking for a full time Platform Software Engineer. LogicGate is building technology to help businesses automate and track disorganized processes. Our office is in the heart of River North with less than 10 minute walks to Brown/Red/Blue CTA train stations and multiple bus stops. We work with Spring Boot, Java 8, Kotlin, AWS and more! We are currently experimenting with Docker and other cutting edge technologies.

To apply, please visit https://logicgate.workable.com/j/003CB3F8FB
